data.name: pegasus_core|Button_Name_Trample_Button
data.tooltip:
Occasionally goes into a rampage, pushing, stunning and dealing <d ref="duckiesHostileMagmadonLeaderTrample_DamageRadius.amount / duckiesHostileMagmadonLeaderTrample_PrimaryBuff.periodic_duration" style="Red"/> damage per second to nearby enemy ground units.

Lasts for <d ref="duckiesHostileMagmadonLeaderTrample_PrimaryBuff.duration"/> seconds.
